script: Please add 1 Bread to my shopping list
I require another 1 Chicken, please put it on the list.
Please add 2 Soap to my shopping list
I require another 2 Soap, please put it on the list.
What is on my current shopping list? Express the list of items as a JSON list of objects with `item` and `quantity` properties only. Consolidate items that are the same.
